item.description:
Per request of some members, it's time for Trivia night at Perro Salado. Now folks, we need you're help. I know a great deal about bugs and weather, but nothing about sports, tv, or pop culture so if this is your area of expertise, or even if it's not, come join us. You can drink, eat great Mexican food, and challenge your wits. What else do you have to do during the winter in Newport? So, let's go.
Paula
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the bar warming up with sangria!
item.name: Margaritas and Minds
